<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1649</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ancient Greece</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Altes Griechenland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Grèce Antique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Greece Antigo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Grecia Antica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχαία Ελλάδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Grecia Antigua</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners task in this activity is to create a script that they will use to explain Greek contributions to tourists visiting the city</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">greece</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">educational activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfängeraufgabe in dieser Aktivität ist, 
einen Index zu erstellen, dem sie pflegen, griechische Beiträge zu 
den Touristen zu erklären, welche die Stadt besichtigen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants chargent dans cette 
activité doit créer une séquence type qu'ils utiliseront pour 
expliquer les contributions grecques aux touristes visitant la ville</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tarefa dos learners nesta atividade é criar um
certificado que se usem explicar as contribuições gregas aos 
turistas que visitam a cidade</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'operazione dei principianti in questa attività
è di creare uno scritto che useranno spiegare i contributi greci ai 
turisti che visitano la città</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η στοιχειώδης εργασία αρχαρίων σε αυτήν την 
δραστηριότητα είναι να δημιουργήσουν ένα αρχείο εντολών που θα 
χρησιμοποιήσουν για να εξηγήσουν τις ελληνικές συνεισφορές στους 
τουρίστες που επισκέπτονται την πόλη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La tarea de los principiantes en esta actividad 
es crear una escritura que utilicen explicar las contribuciones 
griegas a los turistas que visitan la ciudad</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechenland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pädagogische Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'anglais d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la Grèce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité éducative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
